commentary: Kuldeep Yadav to Faheem Ashraf, out Bowled,, Fifer for Kuldeep,, Length ball that skids on again, goes through the defence of Faheem Ashraf who went onto his backfoot and tried to work it leg side
Kuldeep Yadav to Faheem Ashraf, no run, was the one that turned back in
Kuldeep Yadav to Faheem Ashraf, no run, pitched up on middle, defended
Kuldeep Yadav to Shaheen Afridi, 1 run, flat delivery on off, slapped over the head of Kuldeep towards long-off
Kuldeep Yadav to Shaheen Afridi, SIX, tossed up delivery, Shaheen backs away and whacks it across the line over long-on for six
Kuldeep Yadav to Shaheen Afridi, no run, tossed up outside off, Shaheen attempts a reverse sweep but misses
Thakur to Faheem Ashraf, no run, length ball angling in sharply and strikes the thigh pad
Thakur to Faheem Ashraf, no run, good length outside off, stays straight and keeps a tad low
Thakur to Faheem Ashraf, no run, length ball on off from round the wicket, cut towards point
Thakur to Faheem Ashraf, no run, full outside off, driven to short cover
Thakur to Faheem Ashraf, 2 runs, good length on the thigh pad, tucked towards deep mid-wicket for a couple of runs
Thakur to Faheem Ashraf, no run, full and straight on off, defended to short cover
Kuldeep Yadav to Shaheen Afridi, no run, length ball on off, defended off the backfoot
Kuldeep Yadav to Shaheen Afridi, no run, flighted delivery on middle, Shaheen defends off the outer half towards backward point
Kuldeep Yadav to Shaheen Afridi, no run, pushed fuller with some loop
Kuldeep Yadav to Iftikhar Ahmed, out Caught&Bowled,, Flat delivery, was spinning away after pitching
Kuldeep Yadav to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, shortens the length and gets some turn back in, tucked to mid-wicket
Kuldeep Yadav to Iftikhar Ahmed, FOUR, tossed up delivery on off, Iftikhar throws the kitchen sink at it
Jadeja to Faheem Ashraf, no run, darted onto middle, defended
Jadeja to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, flighted up on off, Iftikhar makes room and drives to deep extra cover
Jadeja to Iftikhar Ahmed, 2 runs, full on middle, slammed to the right of long-on for a couple of runs
Jadeja to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, flat on off, cut from the stumps towards backward point
Jadeja to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, steep turn and bounce,, Pitched on middle and ends outside off with some sharp bounce as well
Jadeja to Faheem Ashraf, 1 run, fired on the pads, glanced behind square
Kuldeep Yadav to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, tossed up on middle, driven back to Kuldeep
Kuldeep Yadav to Faheem Ashraf, 1 run, flighted up and with a bit of width, driven past the catching cover fielder
Kuldeep Yadav to Shadab Khan, out Caught by Thakur,, Third wicket for Kuldeep,, Tossed up delivery and Shadab plays a half-hearted chipped drive towards long-on
Kuldeep Yadav to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, length ball that turns away, punched square of the wicket for a single
Kuldeep Yadav to Shadab Khan, 1 run, Shadab backs away and Kuldeep goes flat
Kuldeep Yadav to Shadab Khan, no run, floated up on off, invites Shadab to drive and it was slightly uppish towards point
Jadeja to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, 98ks delivery that's fraction short, Iftikhar chops it towards cover-point
Jadeja to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, 99ks dart around off, Iftikhar angles it to backward point
Jadeja to Shadab Khan, 1 run, 96ks full delivery, Shadab drives uppishly towards long-off
Jadeja to Shadab Khan, 2 runs, short and outside off, Shadab cuts it square on the off-side and races back for the second
Jadeja to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, flatter and around off, Iftikhar opens the bat face and directs it to cover-point
Jadeja to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, drifts in with the angle, Iftikhar nudges it to mid-wicket
Kuldeep Yadav to Shadab Khan, no run, pushed through on off, Shadab knocks it back down the wicket
Kuldeep Yadav to Shadab Khan, no run, floated up on off and middle, Shadab pushes it back to Kuldeep
Kuldeep Yadav to Iftikhar Ahmed, 3 runs, chance and not taken
Kuldeep Yadav to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, quicker delivery on off, Iftikhar makes room and chops it to point
Kuldeep Yadav to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, short and turning in, Iftikhar is cramped and mistimes the pull to mid-wicket
Kuldeep Yadav to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, flighted on leg-stump, Iftikhar works it with the spin to mid-wicket
Jadeja to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, short of length around off, Iftikhar knocks it to long-off
Jadeja to Shadab Khan, 1 run, flatter and outside off, Shadab directs it square of the wicket
Jadeja to Shadab Khan, no run, slower, shorter and turns away, Shadab is stuck to the crease and goes feeling for the ball, beaten
Jadeja to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, full and outside off, Iftikhar drives square and the sweeper tidies up
Jadeja to Shadab Khan, 1 run, darted outside off, Shadab opens the bat face and eases it to sweeper cover
Jadeja to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, quicker and around off, Iftikhar plays it wide of cover and crosses over
Kuldeep Yadav to Agha Salman, out Lbw,, Pakistan don't lose the review
Kuldeep Yadav to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, he thought about the sweep but the length was too full, eases it to long-on
Kuldeep Yadav to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, flatter and close to off, Iftikhar knocks it towards cover
Kuldeep Yadav to Agha Salman, 1 run, googly on leg-stump, Salman sweeps on the bounce to deep backward square
Kuldeep Yadav to Agha Salman, no run, quicker delivery at the stumps, Salman turns it to mid-wicket
Kuldeep Yadav to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, half tracker and Iftikhar pulls to deep mid-wicket
Jadeja to Agha Salman, 2 runs, this time Salman connects with the paddle sweep and sends it to fine leg, easy brace
Jadeja to Agha Salman, no run, 95ks full delivery on off, Salman pushes firmly to cover
Jadeja to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, very full delivery on off, Iftikhar digs it out to mid-on and quickly crosses over
Jadeja to Agha Salman, 1 run, quicker and outside off, Salman drives to sweeper cover
Jadeja to Agha Salman, FOUR, calculated risk
Jadeja to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, short and outside off, Iftikhar cuts to backward point and Gill fumbles
Kuldeep Yadav to Agha Salman, no run, ufff, Googly and it turns away sharply, Salman leans forward and closes the bat face, beaten all ends up
Kuldeep Yadav to Agha Salman, no run, quicker delivery close to off, Salman pushes it back to Kuldeep
Kuldeep Yadav to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, wrong 'un on off, Iftikhar pushes to mid-off and quickly crosses over
Kuldeep Yadav to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, not all that short but Iftikhar still goes for the pull, toe-ends it to the off-side
Kuldeep Yadav to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, short of length googly around off, Iftikhar defends down the pitch
Kuldeep Yadav to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, flatter and skidding on, Iftikhar knocks it to mid-wicket
Jadeja to Agha Salman, no run, ouch, Oh no
Jadeja to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, 94ks full delivery outside off, Iftikhar opens the bat face and eases it to sweeper cover
Jadeja to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, holds the length back a bit, Iftikhar knocks it to cover
Jadeja to Agha Salman, 1 run, 93ks fullish delivery and Salman drives to long-off
Jadeja to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, 95ks delivery close to off, Iftikhar pushes it towards point
Jadeja to Agha Salman, 1 run, starts with a dart around off, Salman eases it to cover
Kuldeep Yadav to Agha Salman, 1 run, full delivery on leg-stump, Salman drives it to long-on
Kuldeep Yadav to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, shortens the length, Iftikhar flicks it uppishly wide of mid-wicket
Kuldeep Yadav to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, uhhh, Wrong 'un and Iftikhar had no clue, he played for the ball turning in and is beaten on the outside edge
Kuldeep Yadav to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, tossed up outside off, Iftikhar blocks to the off-side
Kuldeep Yadav to Fakhar Zaman, out Bowled,, Cleaned up, Zaman survived some nervy moments early on, was dropped by Rohit in Kuldeep's first over and finally he perishes
Kuldeep Yadav to Fakhar Zaman, no run, drifts across and turns, Zaman defends to the left of Kuldeep
Hardik Pandya to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, short and banged into the wicket, Zaman pulls to deep square leg
Hardik Pandya to Fakhar Zaman, no run, slower ball down leg, Zaman misses the glance and the ball rolls off the pad to Rahul
Hardik Pandya to Fakhar Zaman, no run, back of a length close to off, Zaman defends to the off-side
Hardik Pandya to Fakhar Zaman, FOUR, finally some intent and Zaman gets it off the middle too
Hardik Pandya to Agha Salman, 1 run, on a length and outside off, Salman drives square and the sweeper tidies up
Hardik Pandya to Agha Salman, no run, 140ks delivery pounded into the pitch and gets a bit of extra lift, Salman fends it with soft hands to mid-wicket
Kuldeep Yadav to Fakhar Zaman, no run, touch quicker now, Zaman stays back and defends off the outer half to backward point
Kuldeep Yadav to Agha Salman, 1 run, bit too full in length and Salman drives it down to long-on
Kuldeep Yadav to Agha Salman, no run, slower and drifted across, Salman defends to cover
Kuldeep Yadav to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, floated up close to off, Zaman sweeps to deep mid-wicket and Kishan keeps it to a single
Kuldeep Yadav to Fakhar Zaman, no run, dropped? By the reactions of the players, it looks like Rohit has put it down
Kuldeep Yadav to Fakhar Zaman, no run, flighted around off, Zaman pushes it off the inner half to mid-on
Hardik Pandya to Agha Salman, no run, on a length and outside off, Salman shoulders arms
Hardik Pandya to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, hip-lined delivery, Zaman tucks it to deep square leg
Hardik Pandya to Fakhar Zaman, no run, charges down the wicket and is met by a shortened length, misses the tuck and is struck on the thigh pad
Hardik Pandya to Fakhar Zaman, no run, angled outside off, Zaman lifts his bat and lets it go
Hardik Pandya to Fakhar Zaman, no run, fullish delivery on off, Zaman defends it back to Hardik
Hardik Pandya to Fakhar Zaman, no run,
Thakur to Agha Salman, no run, decks in from good length and cuts Salman into half, he was pressing forward to defend but is beaten due to the movement
Thakur to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, too straight - on middle and leg, Zaman flicks to deep square leg
Thakur to Fakhar Zaman, no run, 136ks back of a length delivery on off, Zaman blocks it to Shardul
Thakur to Fakhar Zaman, no run, stifled appeal for LBW
Thakur to Agha Salman, 1 run, full and outside off, Salman drives with an open bat face towards sweeper cover
Thakur to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, hip-lined delivery, Zaman tucks it to deep square leg
Hardik Pandya to Agha Salman, no run, beauty, How has that missed the edge or off-stump? Salman is lucky to be out there
Hardik Pandya to Agha Salman, 2 runs, fullish in-angler, Salman pushes it off the inner half past mid-wicket and picks up a brace
Hardik Pandya to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, short of length delivery, Zaman mistimes the pull to deep square leg
Hardik Pandya to Fakhar Zaman, no run, another delivery that goes past the edge
Hardik Pandya to Fakhar Zaman, no run, 136ks fuller and around off, Zaman pushes it off the top half of the bat to cover
Hardik Pandya to Agha Salman, leg byes, 1 run, nips back in from short of length, Salman hops and is beaten on the inside edge, the ball deflects off the thigh pad to backward point
Hardik Pandya to Agha Salman, 5 wides, bouncer but too short and keeps climbing, Salman does not even have to duck fully and he sees the ball fly over him, no chance for Rahul as well
Thakur to Fakhar Zaman, no run, uhh, He produces jaffas every now and then
Thakur to Fakhar Zaman, no run, 135ks full delivery on off, Zaman defends it back to Shardul
Thakur to Agha Salman, 1 run, 135ks full delivery on off, Salman flicks wide of mid-on and Hardik makes a good stop
Thakur to Agha Salman, FOUR, lovely shot, Nothing wrong with the delivery
Thakur to Agha Salman, 2 runs, short and width on offer, Salman slashes over backward point and Bumrah tidies up in the deep
Thakur to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, short of length at the body, Zaman swivels and pulls to deep backward square
Hardik Pandya to Agha Salman, no run, 138ks nips back in from good length, Salman shoulders arms
Hardik Pandya to Agha Salman, no run, 140ks good length ball around off, Salman blocks to point
Hardik Pandya to Agha Salman, no run, full and at the stumps, Salman almost digs it out to mid-on
Hardik Pandya to Agha Salman, no run, appeal for caught behind from Hardik
Hardik Pandya to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, angled across the left hander, Zaman drives on the bounce to sweeper cover
Hardik Pandya to Fakhar Zaman, no run, 136ks fullish delivery around off, Zaman prods forward and defends to cover
Thakur to Agha Salman, no run, attacks the stumps, Salman is not fully forward as he blocks to the right of Shardul
Thakur to Agha Salman, no run, fuller than a good length, Salman prods forward and defends to the off-side
Thakur to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, short of length at the body, Zaman pulls it backward of square leg
Thakur to Fakhar Zaman, wide, wayward delivery down leg
Hardik Pandya to Rizwan, 1 run, full on off stump, Rizwan drives it to the left of mid-off for a quick single
Hardik Pandya to Rizwan, no run, India lose their second review
Hardik Pandya to Babar Azam, out Bowled,, Oh dear,, An absolute corker from Hardik Pandya, a big inswinger that is too good even for the Pakistani skipper
Hardik Pandya to Babar Azam, no run, good length and a bit of inward movements towards off stump
Hardik Pandya to Babar Azam, no run, 133 clicks, fuller on off stump, Babar defends it once again
Hardik Pandya to Babar Azam, no run, good length and straight, defended back to the bowler
Siraj to Babar Azam, 1 run, length ball angling onto the pads, tucked to the right of mid-on for a single
Siraj to Babar Azam, no run, 139 clicks, full on off stump, pushed towards mid-off
Siraj to Babar Azam, FOUR, full and swings in, glanced to the right of the mid-wicket fielder and that will travel till the fence
Siraj to Babar Azam, no run, full outside off, a cracking drive from Babar but towards mid-off
Siraj to Babar Azam, no run, full and quick on off stump, Babar presents a solid defence
Siraj to Babar Azam, no run, full and was the inswinger
Bumrah to Fakhar Zaman, no run, full and coming in with the round the wicket angle
Bumrah to Babar Azam, 1 run, good length and wide, Azam punches at it and gets an edge that goes after a couple of bounces towards first slip
Bumrah to Babar Azam, no run, another beauty,, This was a length ball that held its line for the longest time before shaping away to beat the batter
Bumrah to Babar Azam, no run, 135 clicks, back of length, gets some steep bounce and away swing to beat Azam on the backfoot punch
Bumrah to Babar Azam, FOUR, finally Babar off the mark,, The first time that Bumrah has erred against him, was back of length and wide
Bumrah to Fakhar Zaman, 3 runs, full and wide, Zaman pushes it between covers and mid-off for three runs
Siraj to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, length ball on the pads, flicked towards Kuldeep at deep square leg
Siraj to Babar Azam, leg byes, 1 run, back of length onto the thigh pad, deflects towards square leg
Siraj to Fakhar Zaman, leg byes, 1 run, India lose their review
Siraj to Fakhar Zaman, FOUR, a bit too full on off stump, Fakhar Zaman clears his front leg and hoists his drive to the right and over mid-off
